title: Delhi breaches 8,300-MW first time ever as heatwave sends power demand soaring
description: Delhi's extreme summer heat pushed its peak power demand to an unprecedented 8,302 MW on Wednesday afternoon, surpassing previous records. This marks the first time Delhi's power demand has crossed the 8,300 MW threshold. Power distribution companies had anticipated a peak of 8,200 MW this summer. The State Load Dispatch Centre reported the peak at 15:36:32 hours.
